description.name: WhatsApp Notify
description.long: WhatsApp Notify is an advanced WhatsApp System which offers you the ability to automatically send WhatsApp Messages to your clients on certain events (such as: WhatsApp for client login, WhatsApp for new invoice, WhatsApp for overdue invoice, etc.). The WhatsApp Notify offers many features which are beneficial to many companies who use WHMCS as their billing system.
features: WhatsApp Settings - Configure WhatsApp gateways settings and WhatsApp alert message templates
Client Login - Send an WhatsApp to your client when someone logs into their account
Client Registration - Let your clients know that their account is setup and that they will receive WhatsApp Alerts
Client Password Change - Alert your client when their password has been changed to their client area
